content:

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: RB-AE-0282, Description: urinary tract infection, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 100mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-0248, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: not related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 25mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-0282, Description: headache, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 10mg

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-0226, Description: GFR measurement repeated due to hemolyzed sample, Severity: minor

### Events
- Protocol training refresher completed for site coordinators
- Bioanalytical lab shipment: 33 frozen urine aliquots dispatched

### Notes
- Week 2: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 46 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
